profile.name: Yassin Assadiki
profile.title: Senior Front-End Developer | Full-Stack Developer in Progress
profile.bio: Experienced web developer with over 8 years of success in designing and implementing scalable, high-performance web applications. Proficient in modern front-end technologies like React, Redux, RTK Query, and TypeScript. Currently expanding into full-stack development using NestJS. Passionate about building efficient, user-centric digital solutions in collaborative and agile environments.

experience.description: Contributing to the development of an innovative SoC configuration platform using Theia IDE, React, Material-UI, and NestJS. Collaborating on solutions with CQRS, Domain-Driven Design, and TypeScript.
highlights: Developing a cutting-edge software platform for configuring SoCs
Using modern front-end technologies: React, Material-UI, TypeScript
Building scalable back-end services with NestJS and CQRS
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize system performance
Ensuring agile best practices and continuous improvement

experience.description: Developed an educational website for the Culture of Peace, utilizing a JSON-based content structure supporting multi-language content management.
highlights: Designed a structured JSON-driven content system
Implemented a multi-language content strategy
Ensured high modularity and maintainability

experience.description: Managed the deployment and optimization of web applications and databases, ensuring performance and uptime.
highlights: Optimized database performance and data integrity
Improved server management and application uptime

experience.company: Khaled Bentounes, Le Bar su Loup, Cannes, France
experience.description:
• Developed an immersive, interactive 3D timeline to represent the life events of a historical personality using ThreeJS and vis.js.
• Crafted dynamic animations with GreenSock and managed date-time functionalities with Day.js to create a rich, engaging user experience.
highlights: Developed an interactive 3D timeline using ThreeJS and vis.js
Crafted dynamic animations with GreenSock
Managed date-time functionalities with Day.js

experience.description:
• Led front-end development by designing a custom project architecture from scratch using VueJS, Vuetify, and TypeScript.
• Enhanced workflows and collaboration by utilizing Git and Sourcetree, supporting over 450 users worldwide in historical data collection.
highlights: Designed a custom project architecture using VueJS and Vuetify
Supported over 450 users worldwide in historical data collection
Enhanced workflows and collaboration with Git and Sourcetree

experience.description:
On mission at the Ministry of Finance (SPF) Belgium 
• Developed and maintained citizen service applications using the Hibernate Framework, ensuring robust data integrity and system reliability.
highlights: Developed and maintained citizen service applications
Ensured robust data integrity and system reliability

experience.description:
On a mission European Patent Office, The Hague, Netherlands : 
• Developed a comprehensive library of UI/UX components with AngularJS and Sass based on atomic design principles.
• Conducted rigorous testing using Selenium, Karma, and Jasmine while managing projects with agile tools such as Jira and Trello.
highlights: Developed a comprehensive library of UI/UX components with AngularJS and Sass
Conducted rigorous testing using Selenium, Karma, and Jasmine
Managed projects with agile tools such as Jira and Trello
